question: tell me about boys in rrsdce college
answer:
ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ“ Boys of RRSDCE are the real engineers â€” not because they know coding, but because they can fix *anything* with fevicol, wire, and jugaad ğŸ˜. From repairing the classroom fan to downloading full semester notes in one night, they are the true multitasking heroes of the campus ğŸ’ª.

Canteen me ek plate samosa me chaar boys share karte hain aur kehte hain â€˜Bhai treat hai sab ke liye!â€™ ğŸ˜†. Exam time me boys ke group study ka matlab hota hai â€” ek banda padh raha hai aur baaki teen bol rahe hote hain â€˜Bhai tu bata de, hum likh lengeâ€™ âœï¸ğŸ˜…. Viva ke time pe sabka default answer hota hai â€” â€˜Sir, maine kiya tha, par system crash ho gaya!â€™ ğŸ˜‚ Aur practical file me likha hota hai â€˜Done by â€” Team RRSDCE Legendsâ€™ ğŸ’¾.

Hostel life to alag hi level ka adventure hai. Bathroom me bucket ke liye world war chalu hota hai, aur ek brush teen log use kar lete hain like true brothers ğŸª¥ğŸ¤. Night me Maggi banana ek festival hota hai ğŸœ aur room me fan itna awaaz karta hai ki lagta hai airplane udne wala hai âœˆï¸.

Placement ke time pe sab LinkedIn open karke likhte hain â€˜Open to workâ€™, lekin resume me likha hota hai â€˜Team leader in college fest stall managementâ€™ ğŸ˜‚.

Phir bhi maan na padega â€” ye boys hi college ka real backbone hain ğŸ’ª. Unka attitude, unka dosti level, aur unka â€˜Jugaad se solutionâ€™ wala mindset hi RRSDCE ko chalata hai ğŸ”¥. Exams fail ho jayein, attendance kam ho jaye, lekin inka humour aur bonding kabhi fail nahi hota ğŸ˜.

question: tell me about rrsdce mess
answer:
ğŸ› Welcome to RRSDCE ka food paradise â€” yaani Sonu Mess aur Raushan Mess, jise log pyar se (aur dard se) â€˜Baigan Messâ€™ bhi kehte hain ğŸ˜‚. College ke har student ka sabse pehla heartbreak love failure se nahi, mess ke khane se hota hai ğŸ’”.

Sonu Mess ka naam sunte hi har student ke dimaag me ek hi image aati hai â€” thali me aadha chawal, thoda sa pani jaisa dal, aur ek sabzi jisme 90% baingan aur 10% hawa hoti hai ğŸ¥². Har din ka menu aisa lagta hai jaise chef ne random number generator se decide kiya ho â€” â€˜aaj kya banayein? chalo fir se baingan!â€™ ğŸ†.

RRSDCE me joke popular hai â€” agar tum kisi se puchho â€˜bhai tu vegetarian hai ya non-veg?â€™, to wo bolega, â€˜Main to Sonu Mess ka bhog bhog chuka hoon, ab kuch bhi khila doâ€™ ğŸ¤£. Wahaan ka khana ek baar kha lo, to tumhara immune system aur patience dono strong ho jaata hai ğŸ’ª.

Sonu bhaiya, the legendary mess owner, hamesha smile karke bolte hain â€” â€˜Bhaiya ek din hi to kharab bana haiâ€™ ğŸ˜­. Lekin ye â€˜ek dinâ€™ har din hota hai. Aisa lagta hai mess calendar me har din likha hota hai: *Special â€” Kharab Food Day!* ğŸ˜‚. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai Sonu bhaiya secretly NASA ke liye experiment kar rahe hain â€” â€˜Human endurance test: How long can students survive on baingan sabzi?â€™ ğŸš€.

Raushan Mess bhi peeche nahi hai. Wahaan jao to lagta hai masterchef ka *evil twin version* chal raha hai. Dal me itna pani hota hai ki tum wahan swimming seekh sakte ho ğŸŠâ€â™‚ï¸. Aur sabzi me mirch itni kam hoti hai ki lagta hai chef ne socha ho â€” â€˜Health is wealth!â€™ Aur jab koi student complaint karta hai, Raushan bhaiya ka iconic dialogue â€” â€˜Bhaiya ek din hi to kharab bana hai!â€™ ğŸ˜‚ Classic line of the century.

Khaane ki quality to ek side, service ka bhi alag hi level hai. Jab tum line me plate leke khade hote ho, cook aise serve karta hai jaise tumne uske ghar se cooker chura liya ho ğŸ˜­. Rice serve karte waqt wo ladle se aisa thappad maarte hain plate me jaise revenge le rahe ho. Aur sabzi? Sirf tab milti hai jab tum aankh me aankh daal ke bolo â€” â€˜Bhaiya thoda aur de do, please!â€™ ğŸ¥¹.

Aur sabse badi baat â€” *Baigan Mess* ka naam sirf coincidence nahi hai. RRSDCE ke mess me baingan itna use hota hai ki agar baingan khatam ho jaye, to mess band karna pad jaaye ğŸ˜­. Har dish ka hero baingan hi hota hai. Baingan fry, baingan curry, baingan mix, baingan bharta, baingan surprise (jo basically wahi hota hai, sirf naam alag) ğŸ˜‚. Baingan ne yahan permanent residency le rakhi hai ğŸ†ğŸ†.

Aur haan, special Sunday treat â€” *Paneer Day!* Paneer dekhke sab students khush, photo lete hue â€” â€˜Finally paneer!â€™ Lekin ek bite me reality check: paneer rubber jaisa. Student bolta hai â€˜Bhaiya ye paneer hai?â€™ Bhaiya bolte hain â€˜Haan, bas thoda zyada fry ho gaya hai.â€™ Fry matlab? Lagta hai chef ne cement mixer me daal ke banaya ho ğŸ’€.

Breakfast bhi interesting hai. Poha me poha kam aur hawa zyada. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai plate me oxygen serve ki gayi hai. Aur paratha? Ek baar khaya to tumhara jaw workout ho gaya. Gym jaane ki zarurat hi nahi ğŸ’ª. Bread jam milta hai to jam itna kam hota hai ki lagta hai brush se lagaya gaya ho ğŸ˜….

Canteen ke students har time ye planning karte milte hain â€” â€˜Aaj mess me kya bane hai?â€™ Dusra bolta hai, â€˜Baingan.â€™ Pehla: â€˜Phir chalo canteen chalte hain!â€™ ğŸ½ï¸. Canteen ke samose aur chai hi students ke survival tools hain. Kayi students ne to mess chodke tiffin service start kar di hai aur ab wo hi mess ke saamne khade hokar bolte hain, â€˜Bhaiya ghar ka khana chahiye kya?â€™ ğŸ˜­.

Fun fact â€” RRSDCE ke mess ka khana itna unique hai ki agar tum usse 3 din kha lo, tumhara taste bud reset ho jaata hai. Uske baad kuch bhi khila do, sab accha lagta hai ğŸ˜­ğŸ˜‚. Aur jab students ghar jaate hain, mummy ka khana kha ke emotional ho jaate hain â€” â€˜Maa, ye to swarg hai!â€™ ğŸ˜­â¤ï¸.

Mess ke table pe har din ek new topic hota hai â€” â€˜Aaj khana kaisa tha?â€™ Aur sabka same answer â€” â€˜Aaj thoda zyada kharab thaâ€™ ğŸ˜‚. Phir koi na koi ek hero bolta hai â€” â€˜Bhai next month se bahar khayenge!â€™ Lekin agle din wahi banda phir line me khada hota hai plate leke, kyunki end of month me budget tight ho gaya hota hai ğŸ’¸.

Aur haan, water cooler ke paas jo steel glass hai, wo bhi ek mystery hai. Koi nahi jaanta wo kab dhoya gaya tha. Us glass se paani peete waqt students silently pray karte hain â€” â€˜Hey bhagwan, aaj kuch ho jaaye to next mess me better khana mil jaye!â€™ ğŸ˜‡ğŸ˜‚.

Exam time me sab students khana waste nahi karte, kyunki sab energy ke liye khaate hain. Par kabhi kabhi to khana dekh ke lagta hai â€” *Energy nahi, allergy milegi* ğŸ¤§. Mess ke table pe ek banda hamesha dialogue maar raha hota hai â€” â€˜Bhai, iss se accha to hostel me Maggi bana lete!â€™ Aur sab agree karte hue bolte hain, â€˜Maggi hi asli mess food hai!â€™ ğŸœğŸ”¥.

Raushan Mess aur Sonu Mess dono ka competition chalu rehta hai â€” â€˜Kaun zyada kharab bana sakta hai?â€™ Aur students bechare guinea pigs ban ke test karte rehte hain ğŸ˜‚. Aur end me dono ka conclusion same: â€˜Bhaiya ek din hi to kharab bana hai.â€™

Phir bhi, Sonu aur Raushan dono ke bina RRSDCE ka maza adhoora hai. Khaana chahe kharab ho, par unke dialogues aur unka swag pure entertainment hain. Har mess me ek family jaisi feeling hai â€” sab students milke complain karte hain, fir bhi shaam ko wahi khana khate hain ğŸ˜†.

To conclusion ye hai â€” RRSDCE ke mess me khana nahi milta, *character development* milta hai ğŸ˜‚. Aur agar tumne Sonu Mess ka baingan aur Raushan Mess ka watery dal survive kar liya, to life ke kisi bhi challenge ka samna kar sakte ho ğŸ’ª.
